dismissals.name: Bowled
dismissals.description: When the bowler delivers the ball and it hits the batter's stumps.

dismissals.name: Caught
dismissals.description: If the batsman hits the ball, and the fielder catches it before it touches the ground.

dismissals.name: LBW
dismissals.description: If the ball hits any part of the batter's body (except the glove) and the umpire thinks it would have hit the stumps.

dismissals.name: Run Out
dismissals.description: When the batsman is attempting a run and a fielder hits the stumps with the ball before the batsman reaches the crease.

dismissals.name: Stumped
dismissals.description: If the batsman steps out of their crease and the wicketkeeper removes the bails with the ball.
